content: end round 11 p3 k2 p3 to end round 12 p2 bc2 fc2 p2 to end round 13 p2 k1 p2 k1 p2 to end round 14 p1 bc2 p2 fc2 p1 to end round 15 p1 k1 p4 k1 p1 to end round 16 bc2 p4 fc2 to end repeat rounds 1-16 for lattice pattern © 2021 carissa browning all rights reserved pattern for personal use only contact carissaknits@gmail com 2 cable stitch pattern round 1 p1 k4 p1 to end round 2 repeat round 1 round 3 repeat round 1 round 4 p1 fc4 p2 k4 p1 to end round 5 p1 k4 p1 to end round 6 repeat round 5 round 7 repeat round 5 round 8 p1 k4 p2 fc4 p1 to end repeat rounds 1-8 for cable pattern chevron stitch pattern round 1 k1 with color b k5 with color a to end round 2 k2 with color b k3 with color a k1 with color b to end round 3 k3 with color b k1 with color a k2 with color b to end round 4 k with color b round 5 k1 with color a k5 with color b to end round 6 k2 with color a k3 with color b k1 with color a to end round 7 k3 with color a k1 with color b k2 with color a to end round 8 k with color a repeat rounds 1-8 for chevron pattern © 2021 carissa browning all rights reserved pattern for personal use only contact carissaknits@gmail com 3 instructions i-cord border row 23 k30 k1 decrease with wrap twice w&t with color a if working chevron pattern row 24 p32 p1 decrease with wrap twice w&t co 3 sts leaving an 8in/20cm tail for sewing row 25 k17 later you should now be back to the original slide sts to opposite end of double-point or beginning of your rounds at the center back of circular needle to work in the same direction the stocking there is still 1 wrap on each side again of heel created on row 23 & 24 round 1 rs k3 slide sts to opposite end of needle foot repeat round 1 until i-cord measures about continue working your chosen stitch pattern 20in/50cm resuming with round 7 of the cable or lattice final row k3tog rotate 90 degrees and pick pattern or round 8 of the chevron pattern up & knit 71 sts along length of i-cord leaving when you get to each of the 2 wrapped about 6 inches of i-cord loose to form hanging stitches on this first round knit or purl them loop during finishing 72 sts according to your chosen stitch pattern join to work in the round together with their wraps place marker for beginning of rounds continue working your chosen stitch pattern for about 5in/12cm or to desired foot length leg ending after round 1 or round 5 of the cable work stitch pattern of choice for about pattern after
